name: llama-hub (run-llama)
description: [项目级] A library of data loaders for LLMs made by the community -- to be used with LlamaIndex and/or LangChain。来源: https://github.com/run-llama/llama-hub

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A library of data loaders for LLMs made by the community -- to be used with LlamaIndex and/or LangChain

来源: https://github.com/run-llama/llama-hub
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 3480

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: These general-purpose loaders are designed to be used as a way to load data into [LlamaIndex](https://github.com/jerryjliu/llama_index) and/or subsequently used in [LangChain](https://github.com/hwchase17/langchain).
